definition: abbr. for Bengbu prefecture-level city 蚌埠市[Beng4 bu4 shi4], Anhui

sentences.english: I picked plenty of colorful clam shells along the seaside.
sentences.chinese: 我在海邊撿了好多彩色蚌殼。

sentences.english: You can find different kinds of fish and calms in the creek.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在小河中找到不同種類的魚和蚌殼。

sentences.english: According to this story, God first created oyster shell, then the eagle.
sentences.chinese: 根據這個故事，神首先創造了蚌殼，接着是老鷹。

sentences.english: A clam swam to the bank and opened its shell in the sun.
sentences.chinese: 一天，河裏的蚌游到岸邊，把蚌殼張開曬太陽。
